entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
